title: BRIEF-Southwest Airlines And Aircraft Mechanics Fraternal Association Reach An Agreement In Principle For Aircraft Mechanics And Related Employees
text:
Market News April 11, 2018 / 5:28 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Southwest Airlines And Aircraft Mechanics Fraternal Association Reach An Agreement In Principle For Aircraft Mechanics And Related Employees Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 11 (Reuters) - Southwest Airlines Co: 
* SOUTHWEST AIRLINES AND AIRCRAFT MECHANICS FRATERNAL ASSOCIATION REACH AN AGREEMENT IN PRINCIPLE FOR AIRCRAFT MECHANICS AND RELATED EMPLOYEES 
* SAYS FIVE-YEAR AGREEMENT INCLUDES TERMS FOR UPDATED WORK RULES, IMPROVED WAGES AND BENEFITS, AND A RATIFICATION BONUS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
